column2: Learned  High  Court Judge,  in  her  judgment  has  extensively  dealt

column1: with this  issue.  Having analyzed  the evidence in the light of the position
suggested  by  the  accused-appellant  that  he  was  "shown"

appellant  whilst  being  detained 
in  the  Police  cell,
Judge  has  concluded  that  no  prejudice  was  caused  as  a  result  since  the

witness  already  knew 
the  accused-appellant  and
witness was emphatic that he has made a positive identification of him.
